levelledPara.title: Scope
levelledPara.para: This data module defines electrical bonding and grounding practices for AMPEL360 PLUS airframe to ensure electrical continuity and EMI protection.

levelledPara.title: Bonding Requirements
levelledPara.para: Electrical continuity requirements between airframe components, including resistance thresholds and measurement procedures.

levelledPara.title: EMI Protection
levelledPara.para: Electromagnetic interference shielding requirements and grounding practices for sensitive avionics and control systems.

levelledPara.title: Cross-References
levelledPara.para: For avionics grounding, see ATA-31/34. For electrical power system grounding, see ATA-24.
